author: tkormann
msg: squeleton of the new transcoder classes

author: tkormann
msg: improve the future new API for transcoder (no more TranscoderFactory, as we can image for than one transcoder that transform SVG->SVG). The factory is limiting the design in fact.
take care of rasterizer and regression tools that still work with the old API and classes

author: deweese
msg: GaussianBlur, Mask, Turbulence all now operate on linear sRGB data.
Added lots of support in GraphicsUtils for working with linear data.
ConvolveMatrix no longer flips the Kernel elements (spec change).
A number of pre-existing bugs were squashed in switching to linear processing
(in particular a few that affected masking, and compositing).

author: tkormann
msg: add support external tref in text element
